translations: 合计（sum 的 ing 形式）

sentences.sentence: There was pandemonium in court as the judge gave his summing-up.
sentences.translation: 当法官做总结时，法庭上一片骚动。

sentences.sentence: Summing up the value of chatting he states.
sentences.translation: 将交谈的价值累加起来，他指出。

sentences.sentence: And you will get the total mass by summing these things.
sentences.translation: 对这些求总和你会得到总质量。
